programme.title: Postcards from Newfoundland and Labrador
programme.desc: Laura Bain and Shelby Travers travel to Canada's most easterly province, Newfoundland and Labrador, and experience the dramatic coastlines, colourful culture and friendly people in this unique part of the country.

programme.title: American Greed
